name: The Oberoi, New Delhi
address: Dr. Zakir Hussain Marg, New Delhi, Delhi 110003
about: A landmark hotel in the heart of the capital, The Oberoi, New Delhi offers breathtaking views of Delhi Golf Course and Humayun's Tomb. It's a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary sophistication.

name: The Oberoi Amarvilas, Agra
address: Taj East Gate Rd, Paktola, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
about: Located just 600 meters from the Taj Mahal, this luxury hotel offers uninterrupted views of the monument from every room. Experience Mughal-inspired architecture and royal hospitality.

images.caption: View of Taj Mahal from the hotel

name: Wildflower Hall, An Oberoi Resort, Shimla
about: Set in 22 acres of virgin woods of pine and cedar, the former residence of Lord Kitchener is a fairytale luxury resort. It offers spectacular views of the Himalayas.

name: The Oberoi Grand, Kolkata
address: 15, Jawaharlal Nehru Rd, New Market Area, Dharmatala, Taltala, Kolkata, West Bengal 700013
about: Affectionately known as the 'Grande Dame of Chowringhee', this iconic hotel offers a blend of classic Victorian architecture and modern amenities. A true oasis in the heart of the city.

name: The Oberoi, Bengaluru
address: 37-39, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Yellappa Garden, Yellappa Chetty Layout, Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
about: A serene sanctuary in the heart of the city, this hotel is known for its lush, tropical gardens and tranquil ambiance, offering a peaceful retreat from the bustling city.

name: The Oberoi, Mumbai
about: Located at the heart of the business and entertainment district, The Oberoi, Mumbai offers stunning views of the ocean and the city's skyline. It's renowned for its contemporary design and impeccable service.

name: The Oberoi Udaivilas, Udaipur
address: Badi-Gorela-Mulla Talai Rd, Haridas Ji Ki Magri, Pichola, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001
about: A magnificent property on the banks of Lake Pichola, The Oberoi Udaivilas stands on the 200-year-old hunting grounds of the Maharana of Mewar. It showcases the rich heritage of the Land of Kings.

roomCategories.name: Premier Room with Semi Private Pool

name: The Oberoi Cecil, Shimla
address: Chaura Maidan Rd, Nabha, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171004
about: A Grand Heritage Hotel, The Oberoi Cecil dates back over 100 years. It offers a colonial-era charm, with its wood-paneled interiors, period furniture, and warm, gracious service.

images.caption: Colonial facade of The Oberoi Cecil
